resources: Name of item Description Add Temperature Radio Citizen Band Radio Global Positioning Device Seat Position This controls all of the temperature settings in the car. This is where all of the radio controls are. Volume, Chanel, Programed Channels, etc.\ This controls the settings to the CB Radio. Volume, Chanel, Tune. This controls the GPS. Destination, Position, ETA, Next turn, etc. This is where all the seat position setting are kept. Back angle, Bottom angle, Seat Height, Distance from Front, Programed Positions.
